title: FS: NEW Large Lot of Mid-Grade T205 w/ HOF and SP **PRICE DROP**

posts.post_title: FS: NEW Large Lot of Mid-Grade T205 w/ HOF and SP **PRICE DROP**
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards for sale or trade. These are mostly nicer looking mid-grade cards as the scans will show, and most have very nice eye appeal. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!
